articles.title: RACE START: Red-flag drama in Monaco as Carlos Sainz and Oscar Piastri bang wheels, Sergio Perez and the Haas drivers come to blows and the Alpines collide | Formula 1® - F1 - The Official Home of Formula 1® Racing
articles.description: It was a hugely dramatic start to Sunday’s Monaco Grand Prix, with the red flags being flown after a matter of seconds due to multiple incidents at the front and rear of the field.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mary Poppins songwriter Richard Sherman dies aged 95 - BBC.com
articles.description: Richard Sherman composed scores for Mary Poppins and the Jungle Book, amassing Oscars and Grammy awards with his brother.
articles.content:
Composer Richard M Sherman, who wrote songs for Disney film classics such as Mary Poppins and Chitty Chitty Bang Bang has died aged 95 in Beverly Hills.

articles.title: Would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games? - TrueAchievements
articles.description: This week, Microsoft announced that Copilot AI tech is coming to PC and Xbox games. For this week's poll, we want to know: would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games?
